        public Root(int offset,
            int radicand,
            int denominator)
        The constructor that sets up the radical, makes calculations and simplifies the radical.
        Parameters:
        offset - An int that is added to the radical, and divided by the denominator
        radicand - An int that is inside the radical.
        denominator - The int inside the radical.
